# UX Checklist: Freshwater Fish Ecommerce Platform

**Purpose**: Comprehensive UX evaluation checklist for the freshwater fish ecommerce platform, focusing on user experience, accessibility, performance, and usability across all user journeys.
**Created**: 2025-10-21
**Feature**: specs/001-freshwater-fish-ecommerce/spec.md

**Note**: This checklist is generated by the `/speckit.checklist` command based on feature context and requirements.

## User Journey & Flow

- [ ] UX001 Homepage loads within 2 seconds with clear value proposition
- [ ] UX002 Product catalog displays with intuitive filtering and search
- [ ] UX003 Product detail pages show comprehensive fish information
- [ ] UX004 Cart and checkout flow is streamlined and secure
- [ ] UX005 Account registration and login are frictionless
- [ ] UX006 Order tracking provides clear status updates

## Accessibility & Inclusivity

- [ ] UX007 All text meets WCAG 2.1 AA contrast ratios (4.5:1)
- [ ] UX008 Keyboard navigation works for all interactive elements
- [ ] UX009 Screen reader support for product information and forms
- [ ] UX010 Alt text provided for all product images
- [ ] UX011 Form labels and error messages are clear and helpful
- [ ] UX012 Responsive design works on mobile devices (320px+)

## Performance & Usability

- [ ] UX013 Page load times under 2 seconds on 3G connections
- [ ] UX014 Search results appear within 500ms of typing
- [ ] UX015 Filter application updates results instantly
- [ ] UX016 Cart updates reflect immediately without page refresh
- [ ] UX017 Form validation provides real-time feedback
- [ ] UX018 Loading states prevent user confusion during actions

## Visual Design & Information Architecture

- [ ] UX019 Consistent visual hierarchy guides user attention
- [ ] UX020 Product cards display essential information at a glance
- [ ] UX021 Navigation is intuitive and follows ecommerce conventions
- [ ] UX022 Call-to-action buttons are prominent and clear
- [ ] UX023 Error states are visually distinct and informative
- [ ] UX024 Success states provide clear confirmation

## Mobile Experience

- [ ] UX025 Touch targets are at least 44px for thumb navigation
- [ ] UX026 Product images are optimized for mobile viewing
- [ ] UX027 Forms adapt to mobile input methods
- [ ] UX028 Cart and checkout work seamlessly on mobile
- [ ] UX029 Search and filtering are mobile-friendly
- [ ] UX030 Performance is optimized for mobile networks

## Edge Cases & Error Handling

- [ ] UX031 Out of stock products are clearly marked
- [ ] UX032 Network errors display helpful retry options
- [ ] UX033 Invalid form inputs show specific correction guidance
- [ ] UX034 Payment failures provide clear next steps
- [ ] UX035 Shipping restrictions are communicated upfront
- [ ] UX036 Live animal handling policies are transparent

## SEO & Discoverability

- [ ] UX037 Page titles are descriptive and include target keywords
- [ ] UX038 Meta descriptions are compelling and under 160 characters
- [ ] UX039 Product pages have structured data markup
- [ ] UX040 Image alt text includes relevant keywords
- [ ] UX041 URL structure is clean and descriptive
- [ ] UX042 Internal linking supports user navigation and SEO

## Notes

- Check items off as completed: `[x]`
- Add comments or findings inline
